overview: An echoing, nocturnal, elliptical text. Female voices speak it. Fragments of music punctuate and suspend the images. The text says the transformation of the hero into a woman during his sleep. Games of inverted masks, transvestites, transparency of the frontiers of the sexes. Self-representations.  Black and white visions clouded with magenta and cyan. Fields, positives, negatives, degrees of grey, light textures.  A device made up of screens and projectors, still images and moving images, the projection surface multiplied.  Water, bare trees, light trails, a gun, tigers.
title: Orlando - Hermaphrodite II
